commit.message:
Auto merge of #9559 - c410-f3r:arith, r=Alexendoo

Fix #9544

Fix #9544

r? `@Alexendoo`

changelog: [`arithmetic_side_effects`]: Fix false negative for `CustomType / usize`, `CustomType * float` and similar
